##### FILE: nfs.nginx.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-nfs-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-nfs-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html/web-app
          name: webcontent
      volumes:
      - name: webcontent
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: pvc-nfs-data

---

apiVersion: v1
kind: PersistentVolume
metadata:
  name: pv-nfs-data
  namespace: default
spec:
  accessModes:
  - ReadWriteMany
  capacity:
    storage: 10Gi
  nfs:
    path: /export/volumes/pod
    server: nfs-server
  persistentVolumeReclaimPolicy: Retain

##### FILE: nfs_deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nfs-client-provisioner:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nfs-client-provisioner
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nfs-client-provisioner
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nfs-client-provisioner
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PROVISIONER_NAME
          value: k8s-sigs.io/nfs-subdir-external-provisioner
        - name: NFS_SERVER
          value: 192.168.100.11
        - name: NFS_PATH
          value: /srv/nfs/kubedata
        image: k8s.gcr.io/sig-storage/nfs-subdir-external-provisioner:v4.0.2
        name: nfs-client-provisioner
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /persistentvolumes
          name: nfs-client-root
      serviceAccountName: nfs-client-provisioner
      volumes:
      - name: nfs-client-root
        nfs:
          path: /srv/nfs/kubedata
          server: 192.168.100.11

---

##### FILE: nfs_nginx_stateful_4.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/web:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: web
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  serviceName: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.7.9
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: web
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
          name: www
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: www
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 500Mi
      storageClassName: manual

---

      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: www
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 500Mi
      storageClassName: manual

    pvname: dce-etcd-backup
  name: dce-etcd-backup
  namespace: default
spec:
  accessModes:
  - ReadWriteOnce
  capacity:
    storage: 50Gi
  claimRef:
    apiVersion: v1
    kind: PersistentVolumeClaim
    name: dce-etcd-backup
    namespace: kube-backup
  nfs:
    path: BACKDIR
    server: NFSSERVER
  nodeAffinity:
    required:
      nodeSelectorTerms:
      - matchExpressions:
        - key: node-role.kubernetes.io/master
          operator: Exists
  persistentVolumeReclaimPolicy: Retain
  volumeMode: Filesystem

---

Mutation has been applied successfully.

##### FILE: nfs12.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/DaemonSet/longhorn-nfs-installation:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  annotations:
    command: OS=$(grep -E "^ID_LIKE=" /etc/os-release | cut -d '=' -f 2); if [[ -z
      "${OS}" ]]; then OS=$(grep -E "^ID=" /etc/os-release | cut -d '=' -f 2); fi;
      if [[ "${OS}" == *"debian"* ]]; then sudo apt-get update -q -y && sudo apt-get
      install -q -y nfs-common && sudo modprobe nfs; elif [[ "${OS}" == *"suse"* ]];
      then sudo zypper --gpg-auto-import-keys -q refresh && sudo zypper --gpg-auto-import-keys
      -q install -y nfs-client && sudo modprobe nfs; else sudo yum makecache -q -y
      && sudo yum --setopt=tsflags=noscripts install -q -y nfs-utils && sudo modprobe
      nfs; fi && if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then echo "nfs install successfully"; else echo
      "nfs install failed error code $?"; fi
  labels:
    app: longhorn-nfs-installation
  name: longhorn-nfs-installation
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: longhorn-nfs-installation
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: longhorn-nfs-installation
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: registry.k8s.io/pause:3.1
        name: sleep
      hostNetwork: true
      hostPID: true
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - nsenter
        - --mount=/proc/1/ns/mnt
        - --
        - bash
        - -c
        - OS=$(grep -E "^ID_LIKE=" /etc/os-release | cut -d '=' -f 2); if [[ -z "${OS}"
          ]]; then OS=$(grep -E "^ID=" /etc/os-release | cut -d '=' -f 2); fi; if
          [[ "${OS}" == *"debian"* ]]; then sudo apt-get update -q -y && sudo apt-get
          install -q -y nfs-common && sudo modprobe nfs; elif [[ "${OS}" == *"suse"*
          ]]; then sudo zypper --gpg-auto-import-keys -q refresh && sudo zypper --gpg-auto-import-keys
          -q install -y nfs-client && sudo modprobe nfs; else sudo yum makecache -q
          -y && sudo yum --setopt=tsflags=noscripts install -q -y nfs-utils && sudo
          modprobe nfs; fi && if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then echo "nfs install successfully";
          else echo "nfs install failed error code $?"; fi
        image: alpine:3.12
        name: nfs-installation
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
  updateStrategy:
    type: RollingUpdate

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/release-name-nfs-subdir-external-provisioner:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nfs-subdir-external-provisioner
    chart: nfs-subdir-external-provisioner-4.0.18
    heritage: Helm
    release: release-name
  name: release-name-nfs-subdir-external-provisioner
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nfs-subdir-external-provisioner
      release: release-name
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations: null
      labels:
        app: nfs-subdir-external-provisioner
        release: release-name
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PROVISIONER_NAME
          value: cluster.local/release-name-nfs-subdir-external-provisioner
        - name: NFS_SERVER
          value: 172.31.11.161
        - name: NFS_PATH
          value: /home/ubuntu/environment/volumenes/nfs
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/nfs-subdir-external-provisioner:v4.0.2
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: nfs-subdir-external-provisioner
        securityContext: {}
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /persistentvolumes
          name: nfs-subdir-external-provisioner-root
      securityContext: {}
      serviceAccountName: release-name-nfs-subdir-external-provisioner
      volumes:
      - name: nfs-subdir-external-provisioner-root
        nfs:
          path: /home/ubuntu/environment/volumenes/nfs
          server: 172.31.11.161

---

  namespace: default

    name: nginx

##### FILE: nfs56.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nfs:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nfs
  name: nfs
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nfs
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: nfs
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: nfs-server
                operator: Exists
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: NFS_EXPORT_0
          value: /data                  *(ro,no_subtree_check)
        image: carlosflor25/nfs-server:latest
        name: nfs-server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 2049
          name: nfs
        resources: {}
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: true
          capabilities:
            add:
            - SYS_ADMIN
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: data
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /opt/data
        name: data

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/nfs
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Deployment/nfs failed:
1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Deployment/nfs failed:
1 - autogen-validate-image-tag validation failure: validation error: Using a mutable image tag e.g. 'latest' is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Deployment/nfs failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/nfs failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/Deployment/nfs failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource default/Deployment/nfs failed:
1 - autogen-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-validate-resources failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/resources/limits/

policy require-pod-probes -> resource default/Deployment/nfs failed:

##### FILE: nfs-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to pv-nfs/Deployment/nfs-client-provisioner-ssd:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nfs-client-provisioner-ssd
  namespace: pv-nfs
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nfs-client-provisioner
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nfs-client-provisioner
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PROVISIONER_NAME
          value: ff1.dev/ssd
        - name: NFS_SERVER
          value: 10.0.0.2
        - name: NFS_PATH
          value: /ssd01
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/nfs-subdir-external-provisioner:v4.0.2
        name: nfs-client-provisioner-ssd
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.1"
            memory: 100Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /persistentvolumes
          name: nfs-client-ssd
      serviceAccountName: nfs-client-provisioner
      volumes:
      - name: nfs-client-ssd
        nfs:
          path: /ssd01
          server: 10.0.0.2

---


Mutation:

##### FILE: nfs-deployment2_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to pv-nfs/Deployment/nfs-client-provisioner-hdd:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nfs-client-provisioner-hdd
  namespace: pv-nfs
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nfs-client-provisioner
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nfs-client-provisioner
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PROVISIONER_NAME
          value: ff1.dev/hdd
        - name: NFS_SERVER
          value: 10.0.0.2
        - name: NFS_PATH
          value: /hdd01
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/nfs-subdir-external-provisioner:v4.0.2
        name: nfs-client-provisioner-hdd
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.1"
            memory: 100Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /persistentvolumes
          name: nfs-client-hdd
      serviceAccountName: nfs-client-provisioner
      volumes:
      - name: nfs-client-hdd
        nfs:
          path: /hdd01
          server: 10.0.0.2

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-deploy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    run: nginx
  name: nginx-deploy
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      run: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        run: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
          name: www
      volumes:
      - name: www
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: pvc-nfs-pv1

---

##### FILE: nfs-deployment-service.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nfs-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nfs-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      role: nfs-server
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        role: nfs-server
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: gcr.io/google_containers/volume-nfs:0.8
        name: nfs-server-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 2049
          name: nfs
        - containerPort: 20048
          name: mountd
        - containerPort: 111
          name: rpcbind
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /exports
          name: storage
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: regcred
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /data/nfs
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: storage

---

##### FILE: nfs-deployment-service_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Service/nfs-service:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: nfs-service
  namespace: default
spec:
  ports:
  - name: nfs

##### FILE: nfs-deployment-service1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nfs-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nfs-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      role: nfs-server
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        role: nfs-server
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: gcr.io/google_containers/volume-nfs:0.8
        name: nfs-server-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 2049
          name: nfs
        - containerPort: 20048
          name: mountd
        - containerPort: 111
          name: rpcbind
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: regcred
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /data/nfs
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: storage

---

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: nfs--pod
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - command:
    - sh
    - -c
    - while true; do echo Siva!!! >> /output/output.txt; sleep 5; done
    image: busybox
    name: busybox
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /output
      name: my-volume
  restartPolicy: Never
  volumes:
  - name: my-volume
    persistentVolumeClaim:
      claimName: nfs-claim

##### FILE: nfs-pod2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-nfs:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    deployment.kubernetes.io/revision: "1"
  generation: 1
  labels:
    run: nginx
  name: nginx-nfs
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      run: nginx
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        run: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          protocol: TCP
        resources: {}
        terminationMessagePath: /dev/termination-log
        terminationMessagePolicy: File
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /opt
          name: nfs-vol
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      restartPolicy: Always
      schedulerName: default-scheduler
      securityContext: {}
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - name: nfs-vol
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: pvc-one

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-nfs:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    deployment.kubernetes.io/revision: "1"
  generation: 1
  labels:
    run: nginx
  name: nginx-nfs
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      run: nginx
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        run: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          protocol: TCP
        resources: {}
        terminationMessagePath: /dev/termination-log
        terminationMessagePolicy: File
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /opt
          name: nfs-vol
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      restartPolicy: Always
      schedulerName: default-scheduler
      securityContext: {}
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - name: nfs-vol
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: pvc-one

    - sh
    - -c
    - while true; do echo Siva!!! >> /output/output.txt; sleep 5; done

    name: busybox
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /output
      name: my-volume
  restartPolicy: Never
  volumes:
  - name: my-volume
    persistentVolumeClaim:

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nfs-server-provisioner:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nfs-server-provisioner
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nfs-server-provisioner
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nfs-server-provisioner
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PROVISIONER_NAME
          value: k8ssudheerdemo.com/nfs
        - name: NFS_SERVER
          value: 10.182.0.6
        - name: NFS_PATH
          value: /var/tmp/nfs-data
        image: k8s.gcr.io/sig-storage/nfs-subdir-external-provisioner:v4.0.2
        name: nfs-client-provisioner
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /persistentvolumes
          name: nfs-server
      serviceAccountName: nfs-server-provisioner
      volumes:
      - name: nfs-server
        nfs:
          path: /var/nfs/nfs-data
          server: 10.182.0.6

---

##### FILE: nfs-provisionar1_6.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nfs-server-provisioner:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nfs-server-provisioner
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nfs-server-provisioner
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nfs-server-provisioner
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PROVISIONER_NAME
          value: k8ssudheerdemo.com/nfs
        - name: NFS_SERVER
          value: 10.182.0.6
        - name: NFS_PATH
          value: /var/tmp/nfs-data
        image: k8s.gcr.io/sig-storage/nfs-subdir-external-provisioner:v4.0.2
        name: nfs-client-provisioner
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /persistentvolumes
          name: nfs-server
      serviceAccountName: nfs-server-provisioner
      volumes:
      - name: nfs-server
        nfs:
          path: /var/nfs/nfs-data
          server: 10.182.0.6

---

kind: StorageClass
metadata:
  name: nfs-client
  namespace: default
parameters:
  onDelete: retain
  pathPattern: ${.PVC.namespace}-${.PVC.name}
provisioner: k8s-sigs.io/nfs-subdir-external-provisioner
reclaimPolicy: Delete
volumeBindingMode: Immediate

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0 

##### FILE: nfs-provisioner-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nfs-client-provisioner:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nfs-client-provisioner
  name: nfs-client-provisioner
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nfs-client-provisioner
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nfs-client-provisioner
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PROVISIONER_NAME
          value: k8s-sigs.io/nfs-subdir-external-provisioner
        - name: NFS_SERVER
          value: 10.3.243.101
        - name: NFS_PATH
          value: /ifs/kubernetes
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/nfs-subdir-external-provisioner:v4.0.2
        name: nfs-client-provisioner
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /persistentvolumes
          name: nfs-client-root
      serviceAccountName: nfs-client-provisioner
      volumes:
      - name: nfs-client-root
        nfs:
          path: /ifs/kubernetes
          server: 10.3.243.101

  namespace: default
spec:
  accessModes:
  - ReadWriteMany
  resources:
    requests:
      storage: 10Mi
  storageClassName: nfs-client

---

##### FILE: nfs-pvc7.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/PersistentVolume/immich-nfs:
apiVersion: v1
kind: PersistentVolume
metadata:
  name: immich-nfs
  namespace: default
spec:
  accessModes:
  - ReadWriteMany
  capacity:
    storage: 1Mi
  mountOptions:
  - nfsvers=4.2
  - nconnect=8
  - hard
  - noatime
  nfs:
    path: /mnt/storage0/k8s/immich
    server: citadel.internal
  persistentVolumeReclaimPolicy: Retain
  storageClassName: immich-nfs

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

##### FILE: nfs-pvc-deploy.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nfs-pvc-deploy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nfs-pvc-deploy
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 4
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nfs-pvc-deploy
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nfs-pvc-deploy
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: sysnet4admin/audit-trail
        name: audit-trail
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /audit
          name: nfs-vol
      volumes:
      - name: nfs-vol
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: nfs-pvc

---

##### FILE: nfs-pvc-example.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nfs-nginx:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: nfs-nginx
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
          name: nfs-nginx
      volumes:
      - name: nfs-nginx
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: nfs-pvc

---

      volume: nfs_share1
    volumeHandle: modeInstance/us-central1-a/nfs-server/nfs_share1
  persistentVolumeReclaimPolicy: Retain
  storageClassName: ""
  volumeMode: Filesystem

apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: ClusterRole
metadata:
  name: nfs-client-provisioner-runner
  namespace: default
rules:
- apiGroups:
  - ""
  resources:
  - persistentvolumes
  verbs:
  - get
  - list
  - watch
  - create
  - delete

  - ""

  - get
  - list
  - watch
  - update

  - storage.k8s.io

  verbs:
  - get
  - list
  - watch

  - ""
  resources:

  - patch

##### FILE: nfs-server2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nfs-server:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nfs-server
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      role: nfs-server
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        role: nfs-server
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: gcr.io/google_containers/volume-nfs:0.8
        name: nfs-server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 2049
          name: nfs
        - containerPort: 20048
          name: mountd
        - containerPort: 111
          name: rpcbind
        securityContext:
          privileged: false
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /exports
          name: nfs-pv
      volumes:
      - gcePersistentDisk:
          fsType: ext4
          pdName: nfs-disk
        name: nfs-pv

---

##### FILE: nfs-server-deploy-svc.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nfs-server:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nfs-server
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      role: nfs-server
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        role: nfs-server
      name: nfs-server-container
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: k8s.gcr.io/volume-nfs:0.8
        name: nfs-server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 2049
          name: nfs
        - containerPort: 20048
          name: mountd
        - containerPort: 111
          name: rpcbind
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /exports
          name: myshare
      nodeSelector:
        name: node3
        role: nfsserver
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /share
        name: myshare

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nfs-client-provisioner:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nfs-client-provisioner
  name: nfs-client-provisioner
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nfs-client-provisioner
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nfs-client-provisioner
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PROVISIONER_NAME
          value: k8s-sigs.io/nfs-subdir-external-provisioner
        - name: NFS_SERVER
          value: 192.168.1.123
        - name: NFS_PATH
          value: /cby-3/nfs/
        image: registry.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/chenby/nfs-subdir-external-provisioner:v4.0.2
        name: nfs-client-provisioner
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /persistentvolumes
          name: nfs-client-root
      serviceAccountName: nfs-client-provisioner
      volumes:
      - name: nfs-client-root
        nfs:
          path: /cby-3/nfs/
          server: 192.168.1.123

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/Deployment/nfs-pod-provisioner:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nfs-pod-provisioner
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nfs-pod-provisioner
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nfs-pod-provisioner
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PROVISIONER_NAME
          value: nfs-provisioner
        - name: NFS_SERVER
          value: 172.31.33.112
        - name: NFS_PATH
          value: /mnt/nfs-share
        image: rkevin/nfs-subdir-external-provisioner:fix-k8s-1.20
        name: nfs-pod-provisioner
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /persistentvolumes
          name: nfs-provisioner-v
      serviceAccountName: nfs-pod-provisioner-sa
      volumes:
      - name: nfs-provisioner-v
        nfs:
          path: /mnt/nfs-share
          server: 172.31.33.112

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nfs-web:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nfs-web
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      role: web-frontend
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        role: web-frontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: web
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: web
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
          name: nfs
      volumes:
      - name: nfs
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: nfs

##### FILE: ngin2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.14.2
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resizePolicy:
        - resourceName: cpu
          restartPolicy: NotRequred
        - resourceName: memory
          restartPolicy: RestartContainer
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 128Mi

---

##### FILE: nginx-affinity.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-affinity-region:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx-affinity-region
  name: nginx-affinity-region
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-affinity-region
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-affinity-region
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: region
                operator: In
                values:
                - us-east-1
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

---

##### FILE: nginx-alpine.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/app-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: app-deployment
  name: app-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 4
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: app-deployment
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 25%!
(MISSING)      maxUnavailable: 25%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: app-deployment
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DB_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_HOST
              name: app-deployment
        image: nginx:alpine
        livenessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 80
        name: app-deployment
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: app-deployment
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi

---

##### FILE: nginx-antiAffinity.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-antiaffinity-region:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx-antiaffinity-region
  name: nginx-antiaffinity-region
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-antiaffinity-region
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-antiaffinity-region
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchLabels:
                app: nginx-antiaffinity-region
            topologyKey: region
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

---

##### FILE: nginx-antiAffinity-preferredSchedule.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-preferredscheduling:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx-preferredscheduling
  name: nginx-preferredscheduling
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-preferredscheduling
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-preferredscheduling
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - podAffinityTerm:
              labelSelector:
                matchLabels:
                  app: nginx-preferredscheduling
              topologyKey: az
            weight: 100
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Deployment/nginx-preferredscheduling failed:
1 - autogen-require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule autogen-require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Deployment/nginx-preferredscheduling failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

##### FILE: nginx-app1_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ReplicationController/my-nginx:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ReplicationController
metadata:
  name: my-nginx
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /home/auto-reload-nginx.sh
        image: ymqytw/nginxhttps:1.5
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /index.html
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: nginxhttps
        ports:
        - containerPort: 443
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/ssl
          name: secret-volume
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/conf.d
          name: configmap-volume
      volumes:
      - name: secret-volume
        secret:
          secretName: nginxsecret
      - configMap:
          name: nginxconfigmap
        name: configmap-volume

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/ReplicationController/my-nginx

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/ReplicationController/my-nginx

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/ReplicationController/my-nginx failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/ReplicationController/my-nginx failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource default/ReplicationController/my-nginx failed:
1 - autogen-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-validate-resources failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/resources/

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:latest
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.25"
            memory: 128Mi

---

##### FILE: nginx-app-example.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-web-server-pool:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-web-server-pool
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-web-server
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-web-server
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        lifecycle:
          postStart:
            exec:
              command:
              - /bin/sh
              - -c
              - echo $( hostname ) > /usr/share/nginx/html/index.html
        name: nginx-web-server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          protocol: TCP

---

##### FILE: nginx-app-ingress-alb.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/nginx-app:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/scheme: internet-facing
    alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/target-type: ip
  name: nginx-app
  namespace: default
spec:
  ingressClassName: alb
  rules:
  - http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: nginx-app-service
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix

---

##### FILE: nginx-auth-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-auth:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-auth
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/auth
          name: auth-volume
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
          name: conf-volume
          subPath: nginx-auth.conf
      volumes:
      - name: auth-volume
        secret:
          secretName: nginx-auth
      - configMap:
          name: nginx-auth-conf
        name: conf-volume

---

##### FILE: nginx-auto-scale.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-auto-scale:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: nginx-auto-scale
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: team
                operator: In
                values:
                - devops
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - nginx
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.25.5
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 200Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: instance_type
        operator: Equal
        value: spot

---

            - /bin/bash
            - -c
            - date; echo Backup Nginx Logs
            image: nginx
            name: backup
          restartPolicy: OnFailure
  schedule: '*/1 * * * *'

##### FILE: nginx-busybox-definition.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/nginx:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    run: nginx
  name: nginx
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: nginx
    name: nginx
    ports:
    - containerPort: 80
    resources: {}
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
      name: container-vol
  dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
  initContainers:
  - command:
    - /bin/sh
    - -c
    - wget -O /work-dir/index.html http://neverssl.com/online
    image: busybox
    name: bb-init
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /work-dir
      name: container-vol
  restartPolicy: Always
  volumes:
  - emptyDir:
      sizeLimit: 50Mi
    name: container-vol
status: {}

---

apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    kubernetes.io/ingress.class: nginx
  name: default-class-ingress
  namespace: default
spec:
  rules:
  - host: default-class.example.com
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: backend2-svc
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /backend2
        pathType: Prefix
      - backend:
          service:
            name: backend1-svc
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /backend1
        pathType: Prefix

apiVersion: v1
data:
  nginx.conf: |-
    events {
        worker_connections 256;
    }

    http {
        upstream instances {
            least_conn;
            server rust-instance:3030;
            server rust-instance-2:3030;
        }
        server {
            listen 9999;
            location / {
                proxy_pass http://instances;
            }
        }
    }
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  annotations:
    use-subpath: "true"
  labels:
    io.kompose.service: nginx
  name: nginx-cm0
  namespace: default

##### FILE: nginx-conf2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/nginx-config:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  nginx.conf: |
    user  nginx;
    worker_processes  1;

    error_log  /var/log/nginx/error.log warn;
    pid        /var/run/nginx.pid;

    events {
        worker_connections  1024;
    }

    http {
        include       /etc/nginx/mime.types;
        default_type  application/octet-stream;

        log_format  main  '$remote_addr - $remote_user [$time_local] "$request" '
                          '$status $body_bytes_sent "$http_referer" '
                          '"$http_user_agent" "$http_x_forwarded_for"';

        access_log  /var/log/nginx/access.log  main;

        sendfile        on;
        #tcp_nopush     on;

        keepalive_timeout  65;
        #gzip  on;

        include /etc/nginx/conf.d/*.conf;

        server {
            listen       80 default_server;
            listen       [::]:80 default_server;
            # server_name  _;
            server_name  www.solju.kr;
            root         /usr/share/nginx/html/;

            location / {
                index index.html index.htm;
            }

            location /v1/ {
                index v1.html;
                try_files $uri $uri/ /v1.html =404;
            }

            error_page 500 502 503 504 /50x.html;
            location = /50x.html {
                root /usr/share/nginx/html;
            }
        }

    }
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: nginx-config
  namespace: default

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/nginx-conf:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  nginx.conf: "user nginx;\nworker_processes auto;\nerror_log /var/log/nginx/error.log;\npid
    /run/nginx.pid;\n\n# Load dynamic modules. See /usr/share/nginx/README.dynamic.\ninclude
    /usr/share/nginx/modules/*.conf;\n\nevents {\n    worker_connections 1024;\n}\n\nhttp
    {\n    log_format  main  '$remote_addr - $remote_user [$time_local] \"$request\"
    '\n                      '$status $body_bytes_sent \"$http_referer\" '\n                      '\"$http_user_agent\"
    \"$http_x_forwarded_for\"';\n    \n    upstream backend {\n    server mywas:8080;\n
    \   }\n\n    access_log  /var/log/nginx/access.log  main;\n\n    sendfile            on;\n
    \   tcp_nopush          on;\n    tcp_nodelay         on;\n    keepalive_timeout
    \  65;\n    types_hash_max_size 2048;\n\n    default_type        application/octet-stream;\n\n
    \   # Load modular configuration files from the /etc/nginx/conf.d directory.\n
    \   # See http://nginx.org/en/docs/ngx_core_module.html#include\n    # for more
    information.\n    include /etc/nginx/conf.d/*.conf;\n\n    server {\n        listen
    \      80 default_server;\n        listen       [::]:80 default_server;\n        server_name
    \ _;\n        root         /usr/share/nginx/html/;\n\n        # Load configuration
    files for the default server block.\n        include /etc/nginx/default.d/*.conf;\n\n
    \       location /api/health {\n            access_log off;\n            error_log
    off;\n            return 200 'OK';\n        }\n        \n        location / {\n
    \           proxy_pass http://backend;\n        }\n\n        error_page 404 /404.html;\n
    \           location = /40x.html {\n            root /usr/share/nginx/html/;\n
    \       }\n\n        error_page 500 502 503 504 /50x.html;\n            location
    = /50x.html {\n        }\n    }\n\n\n}\n"
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: nginx-conf
  namespace: default

    pid        /var/run/nginx.pid;


    events {

    http {

  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: web-chat
  template:

      labels:
        app: web-chat
    spec:
      containers:

        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html/
          name: html
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/
          name: config

        name: html
      - configMap:

        name: config

  http2: "true"
  log-format: $remote_addr - $remote_user [$time_local] "$request" $status $grpc_status
    $body_bytes_sent "$http_referer" "$http_user_agent" "$http_x_forwarded_for"
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: nginx-config
  namespace: nginx-ingress

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

##### FILE: nginx-config37.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/nginx-config:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  nginx.conf: |
    events {
      worker_connections 768;
    }
    http {
      access_log /var/log/nginx/access.log combined;
      server {
        root /usr/share/nginx/html;
        index index.php index.html index.htm;
        location / {
          try_files $uri $uri/ =404;
        }
        location ~ \.php$ {
          include fastcgi_params;
          fastcgi_pass 127.0.0.1:9000;
          fastcgi_index index.php;
          fastcgi_param SCRIPT_FILENAME $document_root$fastcgi_script_name;
        }
      }
    }
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: nginx-config
  namespace: default

---

##### FILE: nginx-config44.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/nginx-config:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  nginx.conf: |
    events { }

    http {
      server {
        listen 80;
        listen 443 ssl;

        ssl_certificate /etc/nginx/tls/nginx.crt;
        ssl_certificate_key /etc/nginx/tls/nginx.key;

        location / {
          return 200 'Bem-vindo ao Nginx!\n';
          add_header Content-Type text/plain;
        }
      }
    }
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: nginx-config
  namespace: default

##### FILE: nginx-config45.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/nginx-config:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  default.conf: |
    server {
        listen 80;
        server_name localhost;

        root /usr/share/nginx/html;
        index index.php index.html index.htm;

        location / {
            try_files $uri $uri/ =404;
        }

        location ~ \.php$ {
            include snippets/fastcgi-php.conf;
            fastcgi_pass php-fpm:9000;
            fastcgi_index index.php;
            fastcgi_param SCRIPT_FILENAME $document_root$fastcgi_script_name;
            include fastcgi_params;
        }

        location ~ /\.ht {
            deny all;
        }
    }
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: nginx-config
  namespace: default

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

##### FILE: nginx-config8.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/nginx-sidecar:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  nginx.conf: |
    worker_processes 1;

    events {
    worker_connections 512;
    }

    http {
      include /etc/nginx/mime.types;
      default_type application/octet-stream;

      server {
          listen 80 default_server;

          location / {
          proxy_pass http://0.0.0.0:5000;
          proxy_redirect off;

          proxy_set_header Host $host;
          proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr;
          proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
          proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme;
          }

          location /static {
          alias /usr/share/nginx/static;
          }

          location /metrics {
          proxy_pass http://0.0.0.0:5000;
          proxy_redirect off;
        }
      }
    }
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  creationTimestamp: null
  name: nginx-sidecar
  namespace: default

---

##### FILE: nginx-configmap12.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/nginx-config:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  nginx.conf: |
    events {
        worker_connections 1024;
    }

    http {
        server {
            listen 80;
            server_name nginxtl.local;

            location / {
                root /usr/share/nginx/html;
                index index.html;
            }

            error_page 500 502 503 504 /50x.html;
            location = /50x.html {
                root /usr/share/nginx/html;
            }

            location = /favicon.ico {
                log_not_found off;
                access_log off;
            }

            location = /robots.txt {
                log_not_found off;
                access_log off;
            }

            access_log off;

            sendfile off;

            client_max_body_size 100m;

            location ~ /\.ht {
                deny all;
            }
        }
    }
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: nginx-config
  namespace: default

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

data:

        listen 80;

            proxy_set_header Host $host;

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/pi-proxy-configmap:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  nginx.conf: "user  nginx;\nworker_processes  1;\n\nerror_log  /var/log/nginx/error.log
    warn;\npid        /var/run/nginx.pid;\n\nevents {\n  worker_connections  1024;\n}\n\nhttp
    {\n  proxy_cache_path /data/nginx/cache levels=1:2 keys_zone=STATIC:10m inactive=24h
    \ max_size=1g;\n\n  gzip  on;    \n  gzip_proxied any;\n\n  map $sent_http_content_type
    $expires {\n    default                    off;\n    ~image/                    6M;\n
    \ } \n\n  server {\n    listen 80 default_server;\n    listen [::]:80 default_server;\n\n
    \   location / {\n        proxy_pass             http://pi-web;\n        proxy_set_header
    \      Host $host;\n        proxy_cache            STATIC;\n        proxy_cache_valid
    \     200  1d;\n        proxy_cache_use_stale  error timeout invalid_header updating\n
    \                              http_500 http_502 http_503 http_504;\n        add_header
    \            X-Cache     $upstream_cache_status;\n        add_header             X-Host
    \     $hostname;         \n    }\n  }\n}"
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: pi-proxy-configmap
  namespace: default

##### FILE: nginx-configmap24.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/nginx-configmap:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  default.conf: "server {\n    listen       80;\n    listen  [::]:80;\n    server_name
    \ localhost;\n\n    # Allow special characters in headers\n    ignore_invalid_headers
    off;\n    # Allow any size file to be uploaded.\n    # Set to a value such as
    1000m; to restrict file size to a specific value\n    client_max_body_size 0;\n
    \   # Disable buffering\n    proxy_buffering off;\n    proxy_request_buffering
    off;\n\n    #access_log  /var/log/nginx/host.access.log  main;\n\n    #location
    / {\n    #    root   /usr/share/nginx/html;\n    #    index  index.html index.htm;\n
    \   #}\n\n    location / {\n    \tproxy_pass http://next-service:3000/;\n    }\n
    \   location /api/nest/ {\n    \tproxy_pass http://nest-service:3000/;\n\n        proxy_set_header
    Host $http_host;\n        proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr;\n        proxy_set_header
    X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;\n        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto
    $http_x_forwarded_proto;\n        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Port $server_port;\n
    \       proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Host $host;\n    }\n    location /api/fastapi/
    {\n        proxy_pass http://fastapi-service:80/;\n\n        proxy_read_timeout
    300s;\n\n        proxy_buffering off;\n        proxy_request_buffering off;\n\n
    \       proxy_set_header Host $http_host;\n        proxy_set_header X-Real-IP
    $remote_addr;\n        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;\n
    \       proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto $http_x_forwarded_proto;\n        proxy_set_header
    X-Forwarded-Port $server_port;\n        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Host $host;\n
    \   }\n    location /minio/ {\n        proxy_set_header Host $http_host;\n        proxy_set_header
    X-Real-IP $remote_addr;\n        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;\n
    \       proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme;\n\n        proxy_connect_timeout
    300;\n        # Default is HTTP/1, keepalive is only enabled in HTTP/1.1\n        proxy_http_version
    1.1;\n        proxy_set_header Connection \"\";\n        chunked_transfer_encoding
    off;\n\n        proxy_pass http://minio-service:9000/;\n    }\n    location /minio/ui/
    {\n        rewrite ^/minio/ui/(.*) /$1 break;\n        proxy_set_header Host $http_host;\n
    \       proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr;\n        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For
    $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;\n        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme;\n
    \       proxy_set_header X-NginX-Proxy true;\n\n        # This is necessary to
    pass the correct IP to be hashed\n        real_ip_header X-Real-IP;\n\n        proxy_connect_timeout
    300;\n\n        # To support websockets in MinIO versions released after January
    2023\n        proxy_http_version 1.1;\n        proxy_set_header Upgrade $http_upgrade;\n
    \       proxy_set_header Connection \"upgrade\";\n        # Some environments
    may encounter CORS errors (Kubernetes + Nginx Ingress)\n        # Uncomment the
    following line to set the Origin request to an empty string\n        # proxy_set_header
    Origin '';\n\n        chunked_transfer_encoding off;\n\n        proxy_pass http://minio-service:9001/;\n
    \   }\n\n    #error_page  404              /404.html;\n\n    # redirect server
    error pages to the static page /50x.html\n    #\n    error_page   500 502 503
    504  /50x.html;\n    location = /50x.html {\n        root   /usr/share/nginx/html;\n
    \   }\n\n    # proxy the PHP scripts to Apache listening on 127.0.0.1:80\n    #\n
    \   #location ~ \\.php$ {\n    #    proxy_pass   http://127.0.0.1;\n    #}\n\n
    \   # pass the PHP scripts to FastCGI server listening on 127.0.0.1:9000\n    #\n
    \   #location ~ \\.php$ {\n    #    root           html;\n    #    fastcgi_pass
    \  127.0.0.1:9000;\n    #    fastcgi_index  index.php;\n    #    fastcgi_param
    \ SCRIPT_FILENAME  /scripts$fastcgi_script_name;\n    #    include        fastcgi_params;\n
    \   #}\n\n    # deny access to .htaccess files, if Apache's document root\n    #
    concurs with nginx's one\n    #\n    #location ~ /\\.ht {\n    #    deny  all;\n
    \   #}\n}\n"

metadata:
  name: nginx-configmap
  namespace: default

##### FILE: nginx-configmap28.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/nginx-conf:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  nginx.conf: |
    user  nginx;
    worker_processes  auto;

    error_log  /var/log/nginx/error.log notice;
    pid        /var/run/nginx.pid;


    events {
        worker_connections  1024;
    }


    http {
        include       /etc/nginx/mime.types;
        default_type  application/octet-stream;

        log_format  main  '$remote_addr - $remote_user [$time_local] "$request" '
                          '$status $body_bytes_sent "$http_referer" '
                          '"$http_user_agent" "$http_x_forwarded_for"';

        access_log  /var/log/nginx/access.log  main;

        sendfile        on;
        #tcp_nopush     on;

        keepalive_timeout  65;

        #gzip  on;

        include /etc/nginx/conf.d/*.conf;  # 

        include /etc/nginx/sites-enabled/*.conf;  # 
    }
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: nginx-conf
  namespace: default

---

Mutation has been applied successfully.

##### FILE: nginx-configmap28_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: nginx
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.22-alpine
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx
          name: nginx-conf
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /var/log/nginx
          name: log
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: nginx.conf
            path: nginx.conf
          - key: virtualhost.conf
            path: virtualhost/virtualhost.conf
          name: nginx-conf
        name: nginx-conf
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: log

---

##### FILE: nginx-configmap37.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/nginx-config:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  nginx.conf: |
    user nginx;
    worker_processes auto;
    error_log /var/log/nginx/error.log;
    pid /var/run/nginx.pid;
    events {
        worker_connections 1024;
    }
    http {
        include /etc/nginx/mime.types;
        default_type application/octet-stream;
        log_format main '$remote_addr - $remote_user [$time_local] "$request" '
                          '$status $body_bytes_sent "$http_referer" '
                          '"$http_user_agent" "$http_x_forwarded_for"';
        access_log /var/log/nginx/access.log main;
        sendfile on;
        tcp_nopush on;
        tcp_nodelay on;
        keepalive_timeout 65;
        types_hash_max_size 2048;
        include /etc/nginx/conf.d/*.conf;
        include /etc/nginx/sites-enabled/*;
    }
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: nginx-config
  namespace: default

---

##### FILE: nginx-configMap38.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/nginx-config:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  nginx.conf: |
    events {
        worker_connections 1024;
    }

    http {
        server {
            listen 8095;
            server_name localhost;
            root /var/www/html;

            index index.html index.htm index.php;

            location ~ \.php$ {
                include fastcgi_params;
                fastcgi_param SCRIPT_FILENAME $document_root$fastcgi_script_name;
                fastcgi_pass 127.0.0.1:9000;
                try_files $uri =404;
            }

            # Add other custom configurations here...
        }
    }
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: nginx-config
  namespace: default

---

    \     200  1d;\n        proxy_cache_use_stale  error timeout invalid_header updating\n
    \                              http_500 http_502 http_503 http_504;\n        add_header
    \            X-Cache     $upstream_cache_status;\n        add_header             X-Host
    \     $hostname;         \n    }\n  }\n}"

    kiamol: ch06

apiVersion: v1
data:
  nginx.conf: |
    worker_processes 1;

    events {
      worker_connections 1024;
    }

    http {
      upstream qa-api {
        server qa-api-service:7777;
      }

      upstream qa-ui {
        server qa-ui-service:3000;
      }

      upstream llm-api {
        server llm-api-service:7000;
      }

      server {
        listen 7800;

        location /api/qa/ {
          proxy_pass http://qa-api/;
        }

        location /api/llm {
          proxy_pass http://llm-api/;
        }

        location / {
          proxy_pass http://qa-ui;
          proxy_http_version 1.1;
          proxy_set_header Upgrade $http_upgrade;
          proxy_set_header Connection "Upgrade";
          proxy_set_header Host $host;
        }
      }
    }
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: nginx-conf
  namespace: default

data:

    events {}

    http {
        server {
            listen 80;

            location / {
                proxy_pass http://react-frontend:80;
                proxy_set_header Host $host;
                proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr;
                proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
                proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme;
            }

            location /api {
                proxy_pass http://node-backend:5000;
                proxy_set_header Host $host;
                proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr;
                proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
                proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme;
            }
        }
    }

##### FILE: nginx-conf-platform.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/nginx-conf:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  default.conf: |
    server {
        listen  443 ssl;
        listen       80;
        listen  [::]:80;

        server_name  localhost;
        if ($scheme = 'http') {
                return 301 https://$host$request_uri;
        }

        ssl_protocols       TLSv1 TLSv1.1 TLSv1.2;
        ssl_ciphers         AES128-SHA:AES256-SHA:RC4-SHA:DES-CBC3-SHA:RC4-MD5;
        # ssl_ciphers         HIGH:!aNULL:!MD5;

        ssl_certificate     certs/cert.pem;
        ssl_certificate_key certs/key.pem;

        #access_log  /var/log/nginx/host.access.log  main;


        # 65SA-API
        location /dev65/api/ {
            proxy_pass  http://65sa-api-core:8000/;
        }

        # 65SA-Platform
        location /dev65/platform/ {
            proxy_pass  http://65sa-web-platform:80/;
        }

        # 65SA-Chat
        location /dev65/chat/ {
            proxy_pass  http://65sa-web-chat:80/;
    }
  nginx.conf: |
    user  nginx;
    worker_processes  auto;

    error_log  /var/log/nginx/error.log notice;
    pid        /var/run/nginx.pid;


    events {
        worker_connections  1024;
    }


    http {
        # include       /etc/nginx/mime.types;
        default_type  application/octet-stream;

        log_format  main  '$remote_addr - $remote_user [$time_local] "$request" '
                          '$status $body_bytes_sent "$http_referer" '
                          '"$http_user_agent" "$http_x_forwarded_for"';

        access_log  /var/log/nginx/access.log  main;

        sendfile        on;
        #tcp_nopush     on;

        keepalive_timeout  65;

        #gzip  on;


        # include /etc/nginx/conf.d/*.conf;  # 
        include /home/dev/api-core-main/build/nginx/conf.d/*.conf;  # 

        # include /etc/nginx/sites-enabled/*.conf;  # 
        include /home/dev/api-core-main/build/nginx/sites-enabled/*.conf;  # 
    }
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: nginx-conf
  namespace: default

---

##### FILE: nginx-conf-platform_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/web-platform:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: platform
  name: web-platform
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: platform
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: platform
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.22-alpine
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
          name: config
          subPath: nginx.conf
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf
          name: config
          readOnly: true
          subPath: default.conf
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
          name: html
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: nginx.conf
            path: nginx.conf
          - key: default.conf
            path: conf.d/default.conf
          name: nginx-conf
        name: config
      - hostPath:
          path: /home/dev/api-core-main/proj/65sa-web-platform
        name: html

---

apiVersion: v1
data:
  nginx.conf: |
    user  nginx;
    worker_processes  auto;

    error_log  /var/log/nginx/error.log notice;
    pid        /var/run/nginx.pid;


    events {
        worker_connections  1024;
    }


    http {
        # include       /etc/nginx/mime.types;
        default_type  application/octet-stream;

        log_format  main  '$remote_addr - $remote_user [$time_local] "$request" '
                          '$status $body_bytes_sent "$http_referer" '
                          '"$http_user_agent" "$http_x_forwarded_for"';

        access_log  /var/log/nginx/access.log  main;

        sendfile        on;
        #tcp_nopush     on;

        keepalive_timeout  65;

        #gzip  on;


        # include /etc/nginx/conf.d/*.conf;  # 
        include /home/dev/api-core-main/build/nginx/conf.d/*.conf;  # 

        # include /etc/nginx/sites-enabled/*.conf;  # 
        include /home/dev/api-core-main/build/nginx/sites-enabled/*.conf;  # 
    }

    server {
        listen  443 ssl;
        listen       80;
        listen  [::]:80;

        # server_name  localhost;
        server_name  web-platform.com;

        if ($scheme = 'http') {
                return 301 https://$host$request_uri;
        }

        ssl_protocols       TLSv1 TLSv1.1 TLSv1.2;
        ssl_ciphers         AES128-SHA:AES256-SHA:RC4-SHA:DES-CBC3-SHA:RC4-MD5;
        # ssl_ciphers         HIGH:!aNULL:!MD5;

        # ssl_certificate     certs/cert.pem;
        # ssl_certificate_key certs/key.pem;

        #access_log  /var/log/nginx/host.access.log  main;


        # 65SA-API
        location /dev65/api/ {
            # proxy_pass  http://65sa-api-core:8000/;
            proxy_pass  http://10.7.0.76:8000/;
        }

        # 65SA-Platform
        location /dev65/platform/ {
            # proxy_pass  http://65sa-web-platform:80/;
            proxy_pass  http://10.7.0.76:80/;
        }

        # 65SA-Chat
        location /dev65/chat/ {
            # proxy_pass  http://65sa-web-chat:80/;
            proxy_pass  http://10.7.0.76:80/;
        }
    }
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: confnginx
  namespace: default

---

Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

##### FILE: nginx-controller_9.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ingress-nginx/Deployment/nginx-ingress-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
  name: nginx-ingress-controller
  namespace: ingress-nginx
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
      app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/port: "10254"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - /nginx-ingress-controller
        - --configmap=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/nginx-configuration
        - --tcp-services-configmap=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/tcp-services
        - --udp-services-configmap=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/udp-services
        - --publish-service=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/ingress-nginx
        - --annotations-prefix=nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io
        env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: quay.io/kubernetes-ingress-controller/nginx-ingress-controller:0.30.0
        lifecycle:
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - /wait-shutdown
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10254
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        name: nginx-ingress-controller
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10254
            scheme: HTTP
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: true
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_BIND_SERVICE
            drop:
            - ALL
          runAsUser: 101
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: nginx-ingress-serviceaccount
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 300

---

##### FILE: nginx-controller1_9.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ingress-nginx/Deployment/nginx-ingress-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
  name: nginx-ingress-controller
  namespace: ingress-nginx
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
      app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/port: "10254"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - /nginx-ingress-controller
        - --configmap=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/nginx-configuration
        - --tcp-services-configmap=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/tcp-services
        - --udp-services-configmap=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/udp-services
        - --publish-service=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/ingress-nginx
        - --annotations-prefix=nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io
        env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: quay.io/kubernetes-ingress-controller/nginx-ingress-controller:0.30.0
        lifecycle:
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - /wait-shutdown
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10254
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        name: nginx-ingress-controller
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10254
            scheme: HTTP
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: true
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_BIND_SERVICE
            drop:
            - ALL
          runAsUser: 101
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: nginx-ingress-serviceaccount
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 300

---

##### FILE: nginx-controller2_14.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ingress-nginx/Deployment/ingress-nginx-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.11.2
  name: ingress-nginx-controller
  namespace: ingress-nginx
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 0
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
      app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.11.2
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - /nginx-ingress-controller
        - --publish-service=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/ingress-nginx-controller
        - --election-id=ingress-nginx-leader
        - --controller-class=k8s.io/ingress-nginx
        - --ingress-class=nginx
        - --configmap=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/ingress-nginx-controller
        - --validating-webhook=:8443
        - --validating-webhook-certificate=/usr/local/certificates/cert
        - --validating-webhook-key=/usr/local/certificates/key
        - --enable-metrics=false
        env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: LD_PRELOAD
          value: /usr/local/lib/libmimalloc.so
        image: registry.k8s.io/ingress-nginx/controller:v1.11.2
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        lifecycle:
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - /wait-shutdown
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10254
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: controller
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: webhook
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10254
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 90Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_BIND_SERVICE
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: false
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 101
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/local/certificates/
          name: webhook-cert
          readOnly: true
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: ingress-nginx
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 300
      volumes:
      - name: webhook-cert
        secret:
          secretName: ingress-nginx-admission

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ingress-nginx/Job/ingress-nginx-admission-create:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: admission-webhook
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.11.2
  name: ingress-nginx-admission-create
  namespace: ingress-nginx
spec:
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: admission-webhook
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.11.2
      name: ingress-nginx-admission-create
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - create
        - --host=ingress-nginx-controller-admission,ingress-nginx-controller-admission.$(POD_NAMESPACE).svc
        - --namespace=$(POD_NAMESPACE)
        - --secret-name=ingress-nginx-admission
        env:
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: registry.k8s.io/ingress-nginx/kube-webhook-certgen:v1.4.3
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: create
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 65532
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
      serviceAccountName: ingress-nginx-admission

    app.kubernetes.io/component: admission-webhook
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx

    - networking.k8s.io
